title: I can't see the minion health bars
body: Basically, the only role I can play now is support because I can't see the minion health bars. Farming is already difficult with poor hit boxes and unit collision. Now, I can't even see their health bars. The red is so dull and practically transparent. This last game was so painful with me having to squint all game.

replies.body: I"m colorblind and I couldn't see minion health bars at all with the winter map in the background. Turning off the winter's map really helped, although it's still harder to see the health bars than before the update.
Do you need glasses or are you colourblind?

> [{quoted}](name=I am Pacman,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=g1dUiMJr,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-12-18T05:27:35.650+0000)
>
> Do you need glasses or are you colourblind?

Or to phrase this into something constructive: Have you tried turning color blind mode on and off and enabling/disabling health bars in the options? That could already solve your problem. Or swapping to another resolution maybe.
